metadata.name: Cold Spring Night
metadata.description:
Title: Cold Spring Night  
Edition: 1/1  
Artist: Omid G E'dlu  
Collection: Away From the City Lights 

Cold Spring Night is a Wide-Field Astrophotography of the Rho Ophiuchi(cloud complex), Dark Horse nebula and Jupiter shine bright in the middle Blended with the cold snowy spring Mountain, in this blend sky contains hours of long exposure to amplify the beauty and wonders of the Night sky that are invisible to the naked eye, 

nowadays living in the big cities in between all the Light Pollution made us forget about the heavens above, but those who wander in the wilderness will see hidden pieces of heaven away from the city lights, 

License: 
Can be used to display privately, in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and displays in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
